text: BIGBANG (; ) is a South Korean boy band under the label YG Entertainment. The current members of the group are G-Dragon, Taeyang and Daesung. Former member Seungri left the group and the entertainment industry in 2019 and former member T.O.P left in 2023. Since their debut in 2006, they have become one of the most popular groups in Korea. BIGBANG has been praised numerous times for their musical talent. The group was planning a comeback in 2020 with a performance at the Coachella festival, however it was cancelled because of the Coronavirus. ==Members== ===Current=== * G-Dragon (Kwon Jiyong ) – Leader, main rapper, vocalist, dancer, face of the group * Taeyang (Dong Young-bae ) – Main vocalist, main dancer * Daesung (Kang Daesung ) – Vocalist ===Past=== * T.O.P (Choi Seung-hyun ) – Lead rapper, vocalist, visual (active 2006–2023) * Seungri (Lee Seung-hyun ) – Lead Vocalist, lead dancer, youngest (active 2006–2019) ==Discography== ===Singles=== *"First Single" -
